original_query: SELECT MIN(v.Id) FROM votes as v, posts as p, users as u WHERE v.UserId = u.Id AND p.OwnerUserId = u.Id AND p.CommentCount>=0 AND u.CreationDate>=CAST('2010-12-15 06:00:24' AS TIMESTAMP)
rewritten_query: CREATE VIEW E1 AS SELECT * FROM votes AS votes
CREATE VIEW E3 AS SELECT * FROM users AS users WHERE users.CreationDate >= TIMESTAMP '2010-12-15 06:00:24'
CREATE VIEW E2 AS SELECT * FROM posts AS posts WHERE posts.CommentCount >= 0
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E3E2 AS SELECT * FROM E3 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E2 WHERE E3.Id=E2.OwnerUserId)
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E1E3E2 AS SELECT MIN(Id) AS EXPR$0 FROM E1 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E3E2 WHERE E1.UserId=E3E2.Id)
